brand.name: Chang Thong Thaimassage
brand.tagline: Your sanctuary for authentic Thai healing and relaxation.

hero.title: Your Golden Moment of Peace
hero.description: Discover authentic Thai massage designed for your well-being. Let go of stress and find harmony in our warm and welcoming atmosphere.

about.introTitle: Meet Yuphin, Founder of Chang Thong
about.bio1: My mission is simple: to help you find relief and balance—whether you are seeking to ease physical tension, alleviate mental stress, or simply wish to enhance your well-being. I started this journey because I believe in the healing power of touch, the importance of inner balance, and the beauty of sharing positive energy.
about.bio2: <0>The Meaning of Chang Thong</0> "Chang Thong" translates to Golden Elephant. In Thai culture, the elephant is a cherished symbol of strength, wisdom, and harmony. The Golden Elephant represents a powerful force for good: calm yet strong, wise yet humble, and always moving forward. This is the spirit I bring to every treatment and to every guest who walks through our doors.
about.bio3: At Chang Thong, we offer more than just a massage. We offer care, connection, and a sanctuary where you can feel safe, seen, and valued.

credits.intro: We value intellectual property rights and want to give proper credit to the creators of the images used on our website.
credits.freepikText: Several images on this website are sourced from Freepik, a platform offering high-quality graphic resources.
credits.aiGeneratedText: Some images on this website have been created using artificial intelligence models to achieve specific visual concepts.
credits.massageProgramImg: <0>Massage Program:</0> Image generated by AI from Gemini.
credits.licenseText: All images from Freepik are used in accordance with Freepik's free license terms, which require attribution. We are grateful to the talented designers and photographers who make their work available. AI-generated images are created as original content for this website.
credits.footerNote: If you are a copyright holder and believe any content on this site infringes your rights, please contact us immediately and we will address the issue promptly.

treatments.title: Our Services
treatments.subtitle: Professional massages for your well-being – with transparent pricing.
treatments.discountSubtitle: *total. For couples and friends who arrive together and want to enjoy a massage at the same time.

essence.title: Discover the Essence of Chang Thong
essence.description: Rooted in Thai tradition, we believe in the power of mindful touch to restore balance to body, mind, and spirit. We welcome everyone—whether you seek relief from tension or a moment of peace. Our mission is simple: to provide a warm space where you can reconnect, recharge, and rediscover your natural flow.

about.title: The Heart of Our Practice
about.paragraph1: Our approach brings together the wisdom of ancient Thai traditions and a modern focus on mindful care. We believe that a great massage is not just about technique—it is about listening to the body and sharing positive energy.
about.paragraph2: At Chang Thong, we invite you to pause the world outside. Whether you need deep muscle relief or gentle relaxation, we provide a warm space where you can restore your natural balance and find your inner strength.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from those who have experienced the serenity and healing at our spa.

items.author: Jessica L.
items.text: An absolutely transcendent experience. The traditional Thai massage was authentic and incredibly effective. I left feeling completely renewed.

items.author: Mark T.
items.text: The ambiance is so peaceful and the staff are wonderful. The aromatherapy massage was the best I've ever had. Highly recommend!

items.author: Sarah P.
items.text: From the moment I walked in, I felt relaxed. The attention to detail is amazing. The foot reflexology was a dream.

footer.tagline: Your sanctuary for authentic Thai healing and relaxation.
